column6: SEVEN THE HARD WAY PART 2 Wolverine's extremely unconventional plan to take down Romulus takes yet another twist, as he now finds himself plotting a prison break. And who is it he's planning to spring? Would you believe...Ruby Thursday?!
column8: | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold | colorist:Andy Troy | writer:Daniel Way
